question: Provide me a enumeration of the average cpu package power in watts consumed by a client, broke out by country.
sql: select a.countryname_normalized, count(distinct b.guid) as number_of_systems, sum(nrs * mean)/sum(nrs) as avg_pkg_power_consumed from reporting.system_sysinfo_unique_normalized a inner join reporting.system_hw_pkg_power b on a.guid = b.guid group by a.countryname_normalized order by avg_pkg_power_consumed desc;
